Npc0427:
ï¿½(I am not your enemy.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I am just a plain ol' mole.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You are certainly stronger than you were while wandering around Onett.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Have you ever suddenly gotten the ï¿½You Wonï¿½ message[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½when you met a weak enemy?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½That's sure-fire proof that you've become stronger.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You don't want to waste your time fighting wimpy enemies, do you?)[HALT][END]
